allow:
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add API routes for servers, channels, messages, threads, scrape

Implement complete REST API using @myorg/api-server with integration tests.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add CLI tools for database init, config validation, and auth setup

Implement three CLI utilities:
- init-db.ts: Initialize SQLite database with schema
- validate-config.ts: Validate discord-config.yaml structure
- auth-setup.ts: Interactive Discord login with cookie persistence

All three CLI tools tested and working correctly.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(sqlite3 discord-scraper.db "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table'';")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
test: add end-to-end scraping integration test

Add comprehensive E2E test covering the complete scraping workflow:
- Job creation and status management
- Message parsing with MessageParser
- Database storage with duplicate handling
- Thread reconstruction with ThreadAnalyzer
- Reply relationship verification
- Complex thread tree structures with branching
- Incremental scraping workflow
- Error handling and failure scenarios

All 5 test cases pass successfully, validating that DatabaseService,
MessageParser, and ThreadAnalyzer integrate correctly for the full
scraping pipeline.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add comprehensive README

Add installation, configuration, usage, and API documentation.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "docs: add scraper orchestration and DOM extraction design

Design for implementing actual Discord scraping with:
- ScrapeOrchestrator to coordinate workflow
- Versioned DiscordDOMExtractor for CSS selectors
- Synchronous job execution via API
- Composite primary key for message deduplication
- Message URLs and rich content flags")

Bash(git commit -m "chore: add .worktrees/ to .gitignore

Prevent worktree contents from being tracked in repository.")

Bash(git add src/services/schema.sql src/domain/models/types.ts src/services/DatabaseService.ts src/domain/metadata-capture/MessageParser.ts src/domain/metadata-capture/__tests__/MessageParser.test.ts src/services/__tests__/DatabaseService.test.ts src/__tests__/e2e-scrape.test.ts src/domain/thread-reconstruction/__tests__/ThreadAnalyzer.test.ts src/domain/models/__tests__/types.test.ts src/cli/db-reset.ts)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add composite primary key and rich content fields to messages

Changes:
- PRIMARY KEY (channel_id, id) for defense in depth
- Add message_url field for direct Discord links
- Add has_attachments and has_embeds boolean flags

Part of scraper orchestration implementation.
EOF
)")
Bash(sqlite3 /root/projects/ScrapeDiscord/.worktrees/scraper-orchestration/discord-scraper.db "SELECT sql FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table'' AND name=''messages'';")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: add unique index on message.id and test for global uniqueness

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "docs: add scraper orchestration implementation plan

Detailed TDD-based implementation plan with 10 tasks for:
- Database schema updates (composite key, new fields)
- DOM extraction module with versioned selectors
- ScrapeOrchestrator to coordinate workflow
- API integration for synchronous scraping
- Comprehensive testing strategy")

Bash(git commit -m "docs: add CLAUDE.md for AI code assistant guidance

Comprehensive guide for Claude Code including:
- Common development commands (build, test, db operations)
- Architecture overview (enterprise pattern, domain structure)
- Core components and data flow
- TypeScript path aliases
- Database schema design decisions
- API routes structure
- Testing strategy
- Common development scenarios")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add RawMessageData type for DOM extraction

Define intermediate format for message data extracted from Discord DOM
before parsing into Message objects.
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement Discord DOM extractor v1

Add versioned DOM extraction logic using CSS selectors.
Extracts all message fields including rich content flags.
Designed for easy replacement when Discord updates UI.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove duplicate RawMessageData type, use dom-selectors version

- Removed duplicate RawMessageData interface from MessageParser.ts
- Updated MessageParser.ts to import RawMessageData from dom-selectors/types
- Added attachment_urls and embed_data fields to dom-selectors RawMessageData for compatibility
- All tests pass, no type errors

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: add DOM selectors module index

Export current extractor version for easy swapping.")

Bash(node -e "const ts = require(''typescript''); const code = ""import { DiscordDOMExtractor, RawMessageData } from ''./src/domain/scrape-engine/dom-selectors/index''; console.log(''Exports work!'');""; console.log(''Import statement valid'')")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement ScrapeOrchestrator

Coordinates complete scraping workflow:
- Job lifecycle management
- Browser/scroller/extractor/parser coordination
- Scraping loop with database storage
- Fail-fast error handling

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent duplicate message counting in orchestrator

Critical fixes:
- Add Set tracking to prevent counting duplicate messages across scroll iterations
- Move job status update to ''running'' before validation to ensure proper state tracking

Important fixes:
- Add comprehensive test for duplicate message handling
- Verify only unique messages are counted and inserted

The scraping loop now tracks seen message IDs and skips duplicates that appear
in overlapping viewports during scrolling, ensuring accurate message counts.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: integrate ScrapeOrchestrator into API

POST /api/scrape/start now executes scraping synchronously using
ScrapeOrchestrator. Returns completed job or error.
EOF
)")
